CHAT.comment: Time is 11:47, video tape doesn't start until later; transcription is solely from audio tape until then

There is very little talk during this activity. Throughout , MOT and Chi engage in parallel play , independently piling and removing magnets from the base magnet. They do not cooperate at all , except once when Chi asks Mot to pick up the purple star from the base which he is having trouble with. The only talk seems to be about whether a certain piece will stick or not. Chi's younger Bro is present during this activity. For the most part he watches Chi and Mot play , and sometimes sings or talks to himself.

u.a: MOT and EXP try to pursuade Bro not to play with the magnets , even though he wants to , until 12:49
video starts here
Chi and Mot are piling things onto the black base magnet independently; in this utterance Chi is unsuccessfully trying to get a penny to stick to other magnets
dumps out the box of magnets
MOT uses the yellow wand to remove some of the magnets from the base
picks up yellow wand , which has a lot of magnets stuck to it
tries unsuccessfully to pick up the purple star from the base using the yellow wand
aft Bro talks a bit in the background
tries unsuccessfully to get a yellow triangle (which has metal on one side and yellow plastic on the other) to stick to other magnets on the base
lifts up yellow triangle to show Mot
BRO had moved over so that he was in between the camera and the magnets
Chi holds the yellow wand over some magnets and moves it around a little , with no real effect
<$=4> continues to move the yellow wand over the magnets , at one point picking up a red ball with it
in moving the yellow wand quickly back and forth over some of the magnets , Chi was able to make a silver man move in synch with the yellow wand

bef Chi used the yellow wand to pick up some of the magnets from the base , knocking off the plastic orange man; Mot then put the orange man back on the base; then Chi hit him with the wand , making him fall down
could be referring to the two silver sticks Mot was trying to stack , which then fell onto the yellow wand Chi was holding and stuck to it
aft pulls a silver man off the yellow wand and puts it on the base
Chi is holding the yellow wand and repeatedly touches it to some magnets , with no effect
mutters to himself
touches the yellow wand to several of the magnets , making some of them fall down
pushes down a silver man so that they're lying flat on the base
picks up a silver man and puts it on the base and tries to make it and some other silver men lie down using the wand
timer goes off
